cast.name: 弗拉迪米尔·波利夫卡 Vladimír Polívka
马提亚斯·热兹尼切克 Matyás Reznícek

introduction: Young documentarist Honza (26) goes to Greece on his father's sailboat. He wants to capture how the local population perceives the refugee crisis. In the harbor, he meets his siblings Matyáš (24) and Natalka (22), whom his father hires as a crew.Contemporary drama taking place at sea is often asking the question: "What is freedom?" It examines how the sibling couple even harshly guards their "illusion" of freedom, they just want to stretch their sails and disappear - By the wind, but is that right? (the official film site)
